form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, FOIA ( (b)(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 OF U. S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service st American Embassy New Delhi a 9/2/92 Mr. Uppal: Our sympathies on the death of your loved ones. In res] onse to your inquiry, please be advised that there are no extensions available on your stay in India. You must return to the U.S. within one year of your departure. Since you have stated that you need at least two years from the date of departue, it would be advisable to have another petition filed in your behalf. Do you have any U.S. Citizen children in the U.S. Please do not hesitate to contact if we may be of assistance. When you do write, please enclose previous correspondence as well. Sincerely, WByan W.L. Bryan OIC INS NDI Passport # F-177823 Date of Birth = 13-1-1906 (13th Jan. 1906). Place of Birth = Daultala (Pakistan) Allien # = A - FOIA (b)(6) Please file Banjis pettition for immigrations immediately. Thanks, Cheekoo
